title: The Sleepover Secret
description: Surprise! What a blast! Ashley is having a sleepover--and Jennifer Dilber, the most popular girl in school, is coming! Ashley works super-hard to make sure her party will be perfect. She doesn't want any surprises. But she gets a big surprise when the girls play Truth or Dare--and Mary-Kate tells Jennifer an amazing secret. A secret she's never even told Ashley... Look inside for our photo scrapbook from the show!
author: Judy Katschke
